page.title: 02Tourism - Ha'Penny Park
page.content: Ha'Penny Park is a very popular place. Lots of people go there every day. There are lots of things to do. There is a Castle of Fun, which you can bounce on and also an Elephant which you can climb into and bounce inside. There is the Shooting Gallery which you aim at the targets and they move. There are lots of Arcade Games and a Secret Tunnel with obstacles that you climb through and get over. There are boats and cars that you control and small cars and motorbikes that you can drive. There is a Play Area with slides, a firemen's pole, a ball pond, ladders and ropes. It is open every day during the summer and it only cost a ha'penny to get in. When the Government abolished the half-penny, Mr. Young, the owner, was allowed to mint his own Cornish Ha'Penny, which looks like gold.
